src.utils.helpers
=================

.. py:module:: src.utils.helpers

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Helper functions module.



Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   src.utils.helpers.open_url
   src.utils.helpers.tr
   src.utils.helpers.normalize_text


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: open_url(url: str, params: Optional[dict] = None) -> bool

   Open a URL in the browser.


.. py:function:: tr(message)

   Get the translation for a string using Qt translation API.


.. py:function:: normalize_text(text)

   Remove accents from text.
